name: Prototype (itch) (DeKU)
description:
A hack and slash game where the main character is a child who is dreaming. But when in his dream there was sabotage from aliens,

Players are required to defeat the enemy according to the waves and get candy from the defeated enemies. Candy is a score in the game. The score is used for altitude and also unlocks several weapons that have achievements requiring a certain height score to unlock them.

Players also have to keep their cellphones so they don't die. If the player dies, the player will wake up from his dream.

All Members:

  • Almando qashmal al-khairi
